Title: Eliminates annual service charge of 25 dollars on issuance of special number plates to veterans of the armed forces
Summary: Eliminates the annual service charge on issuance of special number plates to veterans of the armed forces.
LawCode: Amd ยง404, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the issuance of special number plates to veterans of the armed forces
